english: Chibi county level city in Xianning 咸寧市|咸宁市[Xian2 ning2 shi4], Hubei/Chibi or Red Cliff in Huangzhou district 黃州區|黄州区[Huang2 zhou1 qu1] of Huanggang city 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], Hubei, scene of the famous battle of Red Cliff of 208
Chifeng prefecture-level city in Inner Mongolia
